title: Game freezes upon champion spawn / game start
body:
Whether I play norms (blind and draft) or ARAM, my game freezes when the champions spawn at game start (after 100% loading). I have to hard reset my computer, and I'm able to "reconnect" into the game with no problems, although usually the team asks for a remake so I don't get to reconnect. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling League but the problem persists. Any ideas on a fix?

EDIT: tried to go into a custom game to see if I could change the graphic settings, client freezes upon spawning into custom games as well...

replies.body: I have disabled the bar, and I am still getting this stupid error. I can't even send a ticket in, saying I have to verify my email...which I have done...and yet I have been waiting for hours for ANOTHER confirmation email, and nothing. I clicked the resend link. I guess they don't send them to gmail? What a joke Riot is, I don't get how such a huge company with so much income can have the worst customer service in the world.

I've seen this issue reported a fair amount as of late, and almost every time, it's caused by the new Xbox game recording feature that was enabled in the Windows 10 Anniversary update. If you're on 10, I suggest [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolves the issue.

Let me know if this helped out!
Sorry for the late reply, I didn't realize people commented! Disabling the game bar fixed the issue. Thanks!

Same problem or at least I think it is is happening to me and I would try your solution if I knew how to open this so called Xbox game recorder. I did recently get a Windows 10 update so If you could tell me how to even open it up in the first place would be very helpful thanks.
